languages.text: "Твои собратья? Раньше ты по другому отзывалась о друкари".
"Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."
languages.original_text: "Твои собратья? Раньше ты по другому отзывалась о друкари".

traits.locale_text: "Your kinsmen? Previously, you didn't refer to the Drukhari as such."
"Your kinsmen? Previously, you didn't refer to the Drukhari as such."
"Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."
"Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."
"Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

languages.text: “你的族人？你以前从来没这么称呼过黑暗灵族。”
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: “你的族人？你以前从来没这么称呼过黑暗灵族。”

languages.text: «¿Tus congéneres? Nunca te habías referido a los Drukhari de ese modo».
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tus congéneres? Nunca te habías referido a los Drukhari de ese modo».

languages.text: « Vos semblables ? Vous n'aviez jamais encore désigné les Drukharis ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: « Vos semblables ? Vous n'aviez jamais encore désigné les Drukharis ainsi. »

languages.text: "Die Euren? So habt Ihr die Drukhari bisher noch nie bezeichnet."
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: "Die Euren? So habt Ihr die Drukhari bisher noch nie bezeichnet."

languages.text: 「キン？デュカーリのことをそう呼ぶのは初めてだな」
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: 「キン？デュカーリのことをそう呼ぶのは初めてだな」

languages.text: "Soydaşların mı? Drukharilere daha önce hiç böyle hitap etmemiştin."
languages.original_text: "Your kin? You have never referred to the Drukhari as such before."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşların mı? Drukharilere daha önce hiç böyle hitap etmemiştin."
